docs.text: Hub and Spoke with Terraform ¶ Overview ¶ This repo contain the necessary scripts to build out an Azure platform using a hub and spoke model. The hub folder contain the terraform files to build vnets on-premise vnet to simulate an on premise datacenter hub vnet spoke1 vnet spoke2 vnet The webapp1_spoke folder contain webapp1 spoke 2 web server that is part of a vmscale set instructions ¶ from Azure Cloud Shell terraform init terraform plan terraform apply More information here more info ¶ Based on the following tutorial https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/terraform/terraform-hub-spoke-introduction
